Recap: After Brody saves Starr the the baby, he gets shot and rushed to the hospital. Greg struggles to save Shaun in the E.R. Gigi knows there is something very fishy with Stacy having a home pregnancy in the trash if she is really pregnant. Kim covers for her when Rex demands some answers about her pregnancy. But since it appears she is a few days pregnant, she knows she need not worry how she can "pull it off" to Rex that she is pregnant.
